title: Question 8
prompt: Choose the answer that is written correctly and shows the correct capitalization and punctuation. Be sure the answer you choose is complete.
feedback:
The correct sentence is, “Soccer, played in over 150 countries, is the most popular sport in the world.” The phrase “played in over 150 countries” is a modifying phrase that explains more about the word “soccer.” It isn’t essential to the sentence’s main idea, but gives extra information. It should be surrounded by commas.

This sentence is incorrect: “Soccer, called football in Europe is played by professionals and amateurs.” The phrase “called football in Europe” is also a modifying phrase that should have a comma at both the beginning and end.

This sentence is also incorrect: “Watching soccer matches with friends and family, can be a lot of fun.” The subject of the sentence is “watching soccer matches with friends and family.“ It shouldn’t be separated from the verb with a comma.

This sentence is also incorrect: “About 250 million people or 4 percent of the world's population play soccer.” The phrase “or 4 percent of the world’s population” explains more about “250 million people.” It should be set off from the rest of the sentence with commas before and after it.
